Monologue.Current: Работник станции{Line}“Поезда ходят по расписанию.”{Next}“Но туристов из Гальбадии с каждым{Line} месяцем всё меньше.”{Next}“Не хочется думать о плохом, но...”
Monologue.Original: Station Staff{Line}“The trains are running{Line} on schedule.”{Next}“There aren’t many tourists{Line} coming from {Term Galbadia}.”{Next}“From my experiences,{Line} in this situation...”

Monologue.Current: Работник станции{Line}“Надеюсь, всё будет хорошо...”
Monologue.Original: Station Staff{Line}“...I hope everything is all right.”

Monologue.Current: Работник станции{Line}“До сих пор, все сиды, которых я проважал,{Line} возвращались целыми и невридимыми.”{Next}“Так что вам нечего бояться.{Line} Счастливого пути!”
Monologue.Original: Station Staff{Line}“So far, all the SeeDs that I have{Line} seen off have come back safely.”{Next}“So there’s nothing for you to worry about.{Line} Have a safe trip.”

Monologue.Current: Продавщица{Line}“Желаете что-нибудь приобрести{Line} перед отбытием? Какие-нибудь сувениры?”
Monologue.Original: Gift Shop Employee{Line}“Do you need to buy anything before you go?{Line} We carry various gifts, too.”

Monologue.Current: “Юноша, а вы в отличной форме!”
Monologue.Original: “Hey, you have a{Line} pretty nice physique.”

Monologue.Current: “Знаете, я профессиональный{Line} фотограф. Вы бы не хотели...{Pause 80}{Line} поработать осветителем?”{Line}Нет уж{Line}А зачем он вам нужен?
Monologue.Original: “I’m a professional photographer.{Line} Wanna be a spotlight technician?”{Line}No way{Line}Why do you need one?

Monologue.Current: “В Гальбадии намечается большой парад.{Line} Я думаю съездить туда.”
Monologue.Original: “There’s gonna be a big parade in {Term Galbadia},{Line} and I’m thinking of going.”

Monologue.Current: “I wanna take a lot of nice pictures{Line} and sell them to a magazine.”
Monologue.Original: “I wanna take a lot of nice pictures{Line} and sell them to a magazine.”

Monologue.Current: “Большое представление, много людей,{Line} много фотографий, много денег.”{Next}“Прибыль поделим 70 на 30...{Line} Я хотела сказать 80 на 20...”{Next}“Хотя, знаешь... Забудь.”
Monologue.Original: “I wanna take a lot of nice pictures{Line} and sell them and make big money.”{Next}“We’ll split everything 70/30.{Line} Actually, how about 80/20?”{Next}“Y’know what, forget about it.”

Monologue.Current: “Ну и ладно. Ты не знаешь{Line} от чего отказался.”
Monologue.Original: “Fine. You don’t know{Line} what you’re missing.”

Monologue.Current: “Всё равно спасибо.”
Monologue.Original: “Ok, thanks anyway.”

Monologue.Current: “Как же я устал. Мне приходится{Line} мотаться по делам между{Line} {Term Timber}ом и {Term Balamb}ом.”{Next}“И конца-края этому не видно...{Line} Меня уже тошнит от поездок.”
Monologue.Original: “Man, I’m beat. I’ve been going back and{Line} forth between {Term Timber} and {Term Balamb} on business.”{Next}“It’s gonna last for a while.{Line} I’m sick of traveling.”

Monologue.Current: “{Term Timber} - огромный город.{Line} Там даже телестудия есть.{Line} Там хорошо делать деньги.”
Monologue.Original: “{Term Timber} has this huge TV in the middle{Line} of the city. I think business is{Line} better there than it is here.”

Monologue.Current: “Но воздух там просто ужасный!{Line} Мне от него становится дурно.”
Monologue.Original: “The air over there is terrible, though.{Line} It makes me sick.”

Monologue.Current: “На месте гальбадианского{Line} президента я бы захватил{Line} {Term Balamb} вместо {Term Dollet}а.”
Monologue.Original: “If I were the President of {Term Galbadia}{Line} I would take over {Term Balamb} instead{Line} of {Term Dollet}.”

Monologue.Current: Работник станции{Line}“Говорю тебе, никогда{Line} не верь Гальбадии!”
Monologue.Original: Station Staff{Line}“I told you!{Line} You can never trust {Term Galbadia}.”

Monologue.Current: “Я работаю на этой станции{Line} уже тридцать лет. ТРИДЦАТЬ ЛЕТ!!!{Line} Поверь, я знаю о чём говорю!”
Monologue.Original: “Hey, I’ve been on station staff for{Line} 30 years. 30 years! Trust me.”

Monologue.Current: Station Staff{Line}“I admit, I didn’t know the {Color Yellow}captain{Color White}{Line} was sleeping in there. But come on,{Line} who would’ve guessed he was in there?”
Monologue.Original: Station Staff{Line}“I admit, I didn’t know the {Color Yellow}captain{Color White}{Line} was sleeping in there. But come on,{Line} who would’ve guessed he was in there?”

Monologue.Current: “It sure was shocking to actually{Line} be taken over by {Term Galbadia}.”
Monologue.Original: “It sure was shocking to actually{Line} be taken over by {Term Galbadia}.”

Monologue.Current: “I guess {Term Galbadia} wasn’t{Line} blind and stupid after all.”
Monologue.Original: “I guess {Term Galbadia} wasn’t{Line} blind and stupid after all.”

Monologue.Current: “But why’d they bother trying to{Line} take over {Term Balamb}? There’s plenty of{Line} better places to invade.”
Monologue.Original: “But why’d they bother trying to{Line} take over {Term Balamb}? There’s plenty of{Line} better places to invade.”

Monologue.Current: Работник станции{Line}“Поезд в {Term Timber} готовится к отбытию.”
Monologue.Original: Station Staff{Line}“The train to {Term Timber} is here.”

Monologue.Current: “Пожалуйста, приобретите{Line} проездной билет.”{Line}3,000 гилей{Line}Нет, спасибо
Monologue.Original: “Please purchase{Line} a train ticket.”{Line}3,000 Gil{Line}Don’t purchase

Monologue.Current: “Пожалуйста, проследуйте{Line} в вагон. Поезд скоро отправляется.”
Monologue.Original: “Please go inside right away.{Line} The train to {Term Timber} will be leaving shortly.”

Monologue.Current: “Мне жаль, но у вас{Line} недостаточно денег...”
Monologue.Original: “I’m sorry but you don’t have enough...”

Monologue.Current: “I overheard Galbadian{Line} soldiers talking about{Line} Esthar...”
Monologue.Original: “I overheard Galbadian{Line} soldiers talking about{Line} Esthar...”

Monologue.Current: “It’s supposed to be some super high tech{Line} country, but nobody knows where it is.{Line} I wonder what the people there are like?”
Monologue.Original: “It’s supposed to be some super high tech{Line} country, but nobody knows where it is.{Line} I wonder what the people there are like?”

Monologue.Current: Работник станции{Line}“Вы можете пройти, но{Line} поездов в данный момент нет.”
Monologue.Original: Station Staff{Line}“You can go inside, but{Line} the train isn’t here yet.”

Monologue.Current: “Хотите сыграть в карты?”{Line}Да{Line}Нет
Monologue.Original: “By the way, how about a game of cards?”{Line}Yes{Line}No

Monologue.Current: “Давай сыграем в карты?”{Line}Да{Line}Нет
Monologue.Original: “Let’s play cards.”{Line}Yes{Line}No

Monologue.Current: Queen{Line}“I am the Queen of Cards. I travel{Line} all over the world to monitor and{Line} enforce the various card rules.”
Monologue.Original: Queen{Line}“I am the Queen of Cards. I travel{Line} all over the world to monitor and{Line} enforce the various card rules.”

Monologue.Current: Queen{Line}“What do you want to know?”{Line}(This region’s rules){Line}(The current trend of the trading rules){Line}(How are the rules passed on?)
Monologue.Original: Queen{Line}“What do you want to know?”{Line}(This region’s rules){Line}(The current trend of the trading rules){Line}(How are the rules passed on?)

Monologue.Current: Queen{Line}“Basically, each region{Line} has its own rules.”{Next}“The rules you’re carrying{Line} are passed on as you travel{Line} to various regions.”{Next}“As for the trading rules, they gradually{Line} spread out from a region where the{Line} card game is most popular.”{Next}“Of course, this region can change constantly{Line} depending on your course and actions.”{Next}“Also, my presence in a region{Line} can change its trading rules{Line} at times.”
Monologue.Original: Queen{Line}“Basically, each region{Line} has its own rules.”{Next}“The rules you’re carrying{Line} are passed on as you travel{Line} to various regions.”{Next}“As for the trading rules, they gradually{Line} spread out from a region where the{Line} card game is most popular.”{Next}“Of course, this region can change constantly{Line} depending on your course and actions.”{Next}“Also, my presence in a region{Line} can change its trading rules{Line} at times.”
